abstract.t: This document describes a method for publishing source prefixes via the BGP protocol, iterating through the SAVNET table entries based on intra-domain next hop SAVNET rules. The generation of intra- domain next hop SAVNET rules is implemented by the intra-domain IGP protocol, and the BGP protocol inherits the source interface list from its next hop SAVNET rules to generate the SAVNET rule table for source prefixes.
